method.name: reportPrepAndRun
method.comment: This method receives all its parameters in a List. Each list item should contain the following: Item 1: (String) Name of folder where the report file (and any images) is stored Item 2: (String) Report name (just the name, without the .report extension) Item 3: (String) Name of output file Item 4: (String) Type of output file in capitals(CSV, TXT, XLS, XML, PDF, HTML or RTF) Item 5: (String) Driver class of your database (e.g. "net.sourceforge.jtds.jdbc.Driver") Item 6: (String) Url of your database (e.g. "jdbc:jtds:sqlserver://10.0.0.230:1433;databaseName=DSSQL;user=ASUSER;password=11111") The above items are compulsory. If your report contains parameters, then for each report parameter, add 2 items in the list. For example, for 2 parameters, you need to entry 4 items: Item 7: (String) Name of report parameter No 1 Item 8: (Variable type) Value of report parameter No 1 Item 9: (String) Name of report parameter No 2 Item 10: (Variable type) Value of report parameter No 2
